title: So are we just going to forget about Kha'zix?
body:
He's been unnerfed for ages, and I've never seen a Kha'zix **NOT** do well. With the changes planned to the jungle he's just going to get even better since he's not much of a farming jungler anyways. 

Not only that but the champion lacks any form of mechanical intensity outside of double jumps and he's almost impossible to face when ahead. I would hate him more but luckily he's not as popular as other OP junglers such as Lee sin and Camille.
